title: Confined Room
alternative_title: Locked Room; Trapped Room; 牢笼密室 閉; ざされた部屋 갇힌 방
status: Locked Room; Trapped Room; 牢笼密室 閉; ざされた部屋 갇힌 방
description:
Description :
        DescriptionThe main character who collects personal information of others and digs into their backs.She hacks into the account of a male classmate she admires and uncovers unimaginable activities.Shocked, P sends an anonymous message to scare him,and after that, the male student suddenly disappears.A few days pass and the protagonist opens his eyes locked in a room with only a computerWill the main character be able to find the criminal who locked him up and escape from the room he is locked in with just a computer?Associated Names:Locked RoomTrapped Room
